While frenzied, the barbarian receives a Deflection penalty. (Berserker) - Grants Tenacious and Hardy Inspirations, instead of Fit and Strong. Hit to Crit on melee attacks and carnage is greatly increased while frenzied. However, the barbarian is confused, cannot see their health, and takes continuous Raw damage while frenzied. (Spirit Frenzy) - While active, attacks can Stagger foes.
